name: Crab and Seafood Stuffed Shells
author: JIMBRADEN1970
summary: These shells stuffed with a creamy seafood mixture will delight your guests.
ingredients: 1 cup creamy salad dressing (such as Miracle Whip®)
directions: Fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil over high heat
Once the water is boiling, stir in the pasta shells, and return to a boil
Cook uncovered, stirring occasionally, until the pasta has cooked through, but is still firm to the bite, about 13 minutes
well in a colander set in the sink, then rinse with cold water until the pasta is cold
While the pasta is cooking, stir the crabmeat, shrimp, celery, onion, and creamy salad dressing in a mixing bowl
Stir in the shredded Swiss cheese
Stuff each shell with some of the seafood mixture, and place into a serving dish
Keep refrigerated until ready to serve
